ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Charm?
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh okay.......I want to thank everyone for all the help of my questions over the last few days...I m up to level 13 now, and loving it.  Bards are so much fun.
ygData.messageBody:
Oh okay.......I want to thank everyone for all the help of my questions
over the last few days...I'm up to level 13 now, and loving it. Bards are
so much fun. I like getting a new song every level, as opposed to other
casters every 4 (or more). Always something to look forward to.

So far the funniest thing I've done is drag Choon/Froon around WK for a
long time. Just don't let them catch you...ouch..they hit pretty hard.
